body: Sometimes your threat range is greater than 20. That is, you can score a threat on a lower number. In such cases, a roll of lower than 20 is not an automatic hit. Any attack roll that doesn't result in a hit is not a threat.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Actions In Combat/Standard Actions/Attack/Critical Hits/Increased Threat Range
name: Increased Threat Range
